title: Master Pass missions
body: do the worlds master pass missions count towards the mission for completing "X" amount of worlds missions? because i have completed 3 missions (the 2 default ones and one master pass mission) and it says ive only completed 2 out of 4 worlds missions. i dont know if this is a glitch or if its supposed to be this way anyone know?

replies.body:
You may be thinking that the first missions would have counted. The first World's mission unlocks the other missions along with the Icon required as well, so that one won't actually count towards the one you're referring to (because you didn't have the "complete 4 worlds missions" when you did the first one). 

With that being said, it does look like the mission missed counting one of them, so you should actually have 3 completed not 2. Hit me back up after finishing the mission "Courage - Knock 'em Down", and I can take another look and make sure it completes correctly!
hello broporo , i have the same issue ... it says that i have completed 3 out of 4 missions and i don't have any more missions to do ... please help me , thank you :)
I'm in the same boat... A real Challenger more like a real pain {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
